CustomField.description: Field created for Out of Charter reporting requirements. This field will be 0 if the Network responded within time and 1 if it was escalated to the second person in the network hierarchy for real escalations only. It will not change for automated escalations. This field will not change from 0 for automatic escalations and this field will only change to 1 for the first real escalation and not change back to 0.
CustomField.label: Actual Network Milestone Violated
